casebody.data:
SCHENKEL & SHULTZ
v.
FOX & ASSO. No. 631A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 20, 2007. David G. Redding, Charlotte, Adrianne Huffman, for Fox & Associates. Samuel T. Reaves, Charlotte, Christi P. Cox, for Schenkel & Shultz. Katherine Jane Allen, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Troy Chivers. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Schenkel & Shultz) shall have up to and including the 2nd day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of February 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
